mapper.insert: insert into cafeMain(cafeNickname, cafeName, cafeAddress, cafeWifi, cafeParking, cafeRefill, cafeTableNum, concentTableNum, cafeLogo, cafePhoneNum, cafeCommentary, cafePassword) values(#{cafeNickname}, #{cafeName}, #{cafeAddress}, #{cafeWifi}, #{cafeParking}, #{cafeRefill}, #{cafeTableNum}, #{concentTableNum}, #{cafeLogo}, #{cafePhoneNum}, #{cafeCommentary}, #{cafePassword})
